author: Gina Heeb
title: Trump signs trade deal with Japan as tensions escalate with China and the EU
description: President Donald Trump signed a final trade agreement with Japan on Monday. The deal would reopen some of the markets farmers had lost access to after the US withdrew from a multilateral Asia-Pacific pact in early 2017. But critics have said it only recovered…
content:
• President Donald Trump signed a final trade agreement with Japan on Monday.
